title: Devcon 7, 2024
description: Join the global community at Devcon, the foremost Ethereum conference, dedicated to in-depth discussions, innovation, and networking within the blockchain and Ethereum ecosystem.

title: Open Source India 2024
description: Explore the vibrant world of open source at Open Source India, the premier conference for engaging with cutting-edge open source technology and leading community experts.

title: Flutter Conf India 2023
description: Get ready to dive deep into the world of Dart and Flutter at Flutter Conf India, the country's leading conference dedicated to top-quality content.

title: CYBERX INDIA ROADSHOW 2023
description: Join over 200+ leading cybersecurity experts with this Roadshow in Delhi and Bangalore for insightful and cutting-edge discussions on latest cybersecurity trends in INDIA.

title: NAIROBI COLOUR FESTIVAL 2024
description: The Nairobi Colour Festival is a vibrant celebration of unity, diversity, and inclusivity. Inspired by the traditional Hindu festival of Holi, join us for a day filled with music, art, food, and a burst of color! Enjoy live performances by top DJs and artists, a gaming area, food & thrift stalls, a kids' area, and more. Letâ€™s come together for an unforgettable experience of fun and togetherness.
